result.eng: I went for a job interview.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé faoi agallamh le haghaidh poist
result.orig: Chuaigh mé faoi agallamh le haghaidh poist

result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé faoi agallaṁ le haġaiḋ poistI went for a job interview.

result.eng: They went over to America.
result.ga: Chuaigh siad anonn go Mericeá
result.orig: Chuaigh siad anonn go Mericeá
result.html: Chuaigh siad anonn go MericeáThey went over to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ siad anonn go MericeáThey went over to America.

result.eng: He went to the airport.
result.ga: Chuaigh sé go dtí an t-aerfort
result.orig: Chuaigh sé go dtí an t-aerfort
result.html: Chuaigh sé go dtí an t-aerfortHe went to the airport.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sé go dtí an t-aerfortHe went to the airport.

result.eng: I am going shopping.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí ag siopadóireacht

result.html: Chuaigh sí ag siopadóireachtI am going shopping.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí ag siopadóireaċtI am going shopping.

result.eng: We went cycling.
result.ga: Chuaigh muid ag rothaíocht
result.orig: Chuaigh muid ag rothaíocht
result.html: Chuaigh muid ag rothaíochtWe went cycling.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ muid ag roṫaíoċtWe went cycling.

result.eng: We went out on Saturday.
result.ga: Chuaigh muid amach Dé Sathairn
result.orig: Chuaigh muid amach Dé Sathairn
result.html: Chuaigh muid amach Dé SathairnWe went out on Saturday.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ muid amaċ Dé SaṫairnWe went out on Saturday.

result.eng: We went on strike.
result.ga: Chuaigh muid ar stailc
result.orig: Chuaigh muid ar stailc
result.html: Chuaigh muid ar stailcWe went on strike.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ muid ar stailcWe went on strike.

result.eng: I went to bed late at night.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oíche
result.orig: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oíche
result.html: Chuaigh mé a luí déanach san oícheI went to bed late at night.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé a luí déanaċ san oíċeI went to bed late at night.

result.eng: I wen over to London.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé sall go Londain
result.orig: Chuaigh mé sall go Londain
result.html: Chuaigh mé sall go LondainI wen over to London.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé sall go LondainI wen over to London.

result.eng: I went up to Dublin.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé soir go Baile Átha Cliath
result.orig: Chuaigh mé soir go Baile Átha Cliath
result.html: Chuaigh mé soir go Baile Átha CliathI went up to Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé soir go Baile Áṫa CliaṫI went up to Dublin.

result.eng: I went around the house several times.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uair
result.orig: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uair
result.html: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uairI went around the house several times.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé ṫart ar an teaċ cúpla uairI went around the house several times.

result.eng: They went on a visit to Rome.
result.ga: Chuaigh siad ar cuairt go dtí an Róimh
result.orig: Chuaigh siad ar cuairt go dtí an Róimh
result.html: Chuaigh siad ar cuairt go dtí an RóimhThey went on a visit to Rome.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ siad ar cuairt go dtí an RóiṁThey went on a visit to Rome.

result.eng: They went along with me.
result.ga: Chuaigh siad i mo theannta
result.orig: Chuaigh siad i mo theannta
result.html: Chuaigh siad i mo theanntaThey went along with me.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ siad i mo ṫeanntaThey went along with me.

result.eng: He devoted himself to politics.
result.ga: Chuaigh sé leis an pholaitíocht
result.orig: Chuaigh sé leis an pholaitíocht
result.html: Chuaigh sé leis an pholaitíochtHe devoted himself to politics.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sé leis an ṗolaitíoċtHe devoted himself to politics.

result.eng: She became a teacher.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí leis an mhúinteoireacht

result.html: Chuaigh sí leis an mhúinteoireachtShe became a teacher.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí leis an ṁúinteoireaċtShe became a teacher.

result.eng: She went overseas looking for work.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibre
result.orig: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibre
result.html: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibreShe went overseas looking for work.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí ṫar lear ag lorg oibreShe went overseas looking for work.

result.eng: I went to a play the night before last.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé chuig dráma arú aréir
result.orig: Chuaigh mé chuig dráma arú aréir
result.html: Chuaigh mé chuig dráma arú aréirI went to a play the night before last.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé ċuig dráma arú aréirI went to a play the night before last.

result.eng: Susan and Tadhg went to the cinema yesterday.
result.ga: Chuaigh Susan agus Tadhg go dtí an phictiúrlann inné
result.orig: Chuaigh Susan agus Tadhg go dtí an phictiúrlann inné
result.html: Chuaigh Susan agus Tadhg go dtí an phictiúrlann innéSusan and Tadhg went to the cinema yesterday.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ Susan agus Taḋg go dtí an ṗictiúrlann innéSusan and Tadhg went to the cinema yesterday.

result.eng: I went to County Kerry last year on my holiday.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé go Contae Chiarraí an bhliain seo caite ar mo laethanta saoire
result.orig: Chuaigh mé go Contae Chiarraí an bhliain seo caite ar mo laethanta saoire
result.html: Chuaigh mé go Contae Chiarraí an bhliain seo caite ar mo laethanta saoireI went to County Kerry last year on my holiday.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé go Contae Ċiarraí an ḃliain seo caite ar mo laeṫanta saoireI went to County Kerry last year on my holiday.

result.eng: She wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ga: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.orig: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.html: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ponchtml: Níor ḃean í a ċuaiġ siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].

result.eng: She went into the storage place crouching.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromada
result.orig: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromada
result.html: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromadaShe went into the storage place crouching.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí isteaċ san ionad stórála ar a cromadaShe went into the storage place crouching.

result.eng: They left the airplane and went inside the other one.
result.ga: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile
result.orig: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile
result.html: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eileThey left the airplane and went inside the other one.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad an t-eitleán agus ċuaiġ isteaċ sa ċeann eileThey left the airplane and went inside the other one.

result.eng: The airplanes went back to America.
result.ga: Chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go Meiriceá
result.orig: Chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go Meiriceá
result.html: Chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go MeiriceáThe airplanes went back to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ na heitleáin ar ais go MeiriceáThe airplanes went back to America.

result.eng: We went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ga: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.orig: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.html: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ muid go lár na caṫraċ ar an ḃus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.

result.eng: "Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
result.ga: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.orig: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.html: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas"Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
result.ponchtml: Amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall Manhattan agus a ċuaiġ róċóngaraċ don ḟoirgneaṁ a ẛíleas"Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.

result.eng: Central to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ga: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa Ghearmáin
result.orig: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa Ghearmáin
result.html: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa GhearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ponchtml: Lárnaċ sa ṗleanáil ḃí Mohammad Atta Éigipteaċ a ċuaiġ le hantoisceaċas Ioslamaċ agus é ina ṁac léinn sa ĠearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.

result.eng: His mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ga: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.orig: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.html: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sé lena ṁáṫair ar ġreim láiṁe go teaċ na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.

result.eng: The children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ga: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.orig: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.html: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ na páistí a luí aċ ní raiḃ fonn codlata orṫuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.

result.eng: Night turned into day.
result.ga: Chuaigh an oíche thart go dtáinig an lá
result.orig: Chuaigh an oíche thart go dtáinig an lá
result.html: Chuaigh an oíche thart go dtáinig an láNight turned into day.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ an oíċe ṫart go dtáinig an láNight turned into day.

result.eng: He went on all fours.
result.ga: Chuaigh sé ar a cheithre boinn
result.orig: Chuaigh sé ar a cheithre boinn
result.html: Chuaigh sé ar a cheithre boinnHe went on all fours.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sé ar a ċeiṫre boinnHe went on all fours.

result.eng: I became desparate.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé in éadóchas
result.orig: Chuaigh mé in éadóchas
result.html: Chuaigh mé in éadóchasI became desparate.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé in éadóċasI became desparate.
